1111.content: One day, Peg Pete arrived at Max's front door wearing gold hoop earrings, a frilly pink ruffled medium sleeved button-front, a frilly white calf-length skirt covered with white bows and ribbons and pink high-heeled front-laced knee high boots. Underneath, she wore frilly pink ruffled lace thong panties with a little pink bow in front, a matching front-hook bra, a matching garter belt and pink lace thigh high stockings. She rung the doorbell and Max opened the door. "Hi, Miss Peg!" Max said with a smile. "Hello, Max dear. You here by yourself?" Peg asked sweetly. "Yes, ma'am. Nice of you to visit me looking very pretty as always." He said nicely making her blush and giggle. "Such a flatterer!" Peg replied with a smile.
1111.title: At home

1432.content:
One day, Peg Pete saw Max finishing up on mowing his lawn. "Yoo hoo, Max dear." Peg said sweetly. "Yes, Miss Peg?" Max responded. "I've asked your father if you could spend the weekend with me, and he agreed." She told him. "That's really cool of you, ma'am. I be glad to spend time with you." Max said. "Wonderful! I'll see you on Friday and the door will be unlocked.." Peg answered back. Friday came and Max opened the front door of Peg's place, walked in and closed the door. "Put your things in P.J.'s room and come down for dinner." Peg called from the kitchen. "Okay, Miss Peg!" Max called back. Max puts his things in P.J.'s room, went into the kitchen and was in awe over what he saw. "I hope you like Chicken Pot Pie, champagne and my dress." Peg said as she was wearing hot pink nail polish on her fingernails and toenails, black mascara on her eyelashes, dark pink eye shadow on her eyelids, light pink eyeliner around her eyes, pink blush on her cheeks, red lipstick on her lips, her nose was powdered and she was spritzed with rose-scented perfume. She also wore a frilly pink ruffled puffy long-sleeved ankle-length zipper-back wide-skirted dress stuffed with pink chiffon and covered with pink bows and ribbons, a pink sash tied into a bow in the back, a pink lace choker, a pair of pink diamond earrings, a matching necklace, matching bracelets around her right wrist and left ankle and her hair was in an up-do adorned with a pink diamond headband.

Did Max say anything?
1432.title: At her house

Peg takes off Max's clothes first
14322.content: "I like the food choice, never tried the drink and you look drop dead gorgeous!" Max replied. "I'm glad you think so, Max. Shall we eat?" Peg asked. Max nods with a smile. Peg lit up a candelabra, serves up dinner, poured champagne into two champagne glasses and they started eating politely and taking little sips. "Max is SO handsome! Why do I have these feelings? Could I be falling in love with him? I wonder what he's thinking?" Peg thought. "Miss Peg's being nicer to me than usual. Could she be falling for me?" Max thought. Minutes later, Max and Peg finished eating and drinking. The latter puts the dirty dishes, utensils and glasses into the dishwasher, puts in some dish-washing liquid, closed the door and starts the machine. Then, they went into the living room and sat down on the couch. "Max, have you ever thought of someone besides your father?" Peg asked. "Why do you ask that?" Max replied. "Well, when I first met you, I thought you were SO cute and handsome. I developed... feelings for you." Peg said reluctantly. "Really? I was thinking the same way about you. Your commanding presence around Pete, your kindness to me and Dad and also I've been attracted to you. You're the prettiest, hottest, cutest, sweetest, nicest and sexiest woman I've met." Max said. "You really think so?" Peg asked blushing and feeling her heart warm at the compliment. "Yes, I do. I wish I was older so you can divorce Pete and marry me." Max explained. "So do I." Peg said. "I don't want Pete to know this, but I love you with all my heart and will you be my secret girlfriend?" Max asked. Peg's eyes teared up a little at the proposal. "Oh, Max! Yes, I will!" Peg replied as she plants a passionate kiss on Max's lips. Max coped with the kiss. Then, he slid his tongue into her mouth, moved it all around and placed his hands on her breasts."Oh, my! Soft nice handiwork!" Peg thought as she placed her hands on Max's butt cheeks. He then picked her up, carried her bridal style to the main bedroom and closed the door. "Do you want me to take off your clothes first?

151.title: Pistol Pete

1512.content: One day, Peg Pete saw her 4 year old daughter Pistol playing in the backyard. She went out there to see her. "Pistol, dear?" said Peg sweetly. "Yes, mommy?" asked Pistol as she came to Peg. "Do you want to play a special grown-up game with me?" Peg asked. "Yes, please." Pistol answered nicely. "Do you want to play it out here or inside?" Peg asked.
1512.title: her mother
